website_summaries.verdict: The Creative Sound Blaster X7 offers a ridiculous number of features for the money and sound quality is generally very good, but its appeal is limited.
pros: The Creative Sound Blaster X7 is a jack-of-all-trades USB amp with that offers unrivaled features and connectivity for the money
Sound quality is up there with dedicated DACs
The volume knob is handy for PC desktop use
cons: Better hi-fi amplifiers can be had for the price
No remote control beyond the smartphone app
Build quality isn't as good as you'd expect for a $400 component
The headphone detection circuit is poor, and hooking up surround sound is a pain

customer_reviews.text: This is the #1 worst purchase I have made in my life. This unit annoyed me by picking up PC noises while it was working on windows 7. Having to give this product 1 star sucks, but I got some enjoyment by smashing this POS with a hammer and never buying a creative labs product again.

customer_reviews.title: Too many problems
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and drive studio quality headphones with 5.1 dolby digital but it doesn't really work for PC. No option to turn off sidetone (hearing yourself speak) and there is latency with the sidetone so you hear your own voice a second after you speak. This is a deal-breaking problem for anyone using this with a headset. Dolby Digital doesn't work from PC to the X7 through the optical audio.

customer_reviews.title: but it handles the switch to stand-alone great. I'm not an audiophile
customer_reviews.text: I bought the X7 mostly to have a dedicated audio mixer for all my various electronic devices. It works. Connected with my computer blasting out game audio and my TV audio saying who is Chopped, it just works. My computer goes of / to sleep, there is a brief 2 second pause, but it handles the switch to stand-alone great. I'm not an audiophile, but I could tell this was slightly better than my onboard audio card. As long as Creative keeps pumping out drivers for it, I think I'll be very happy.

customer_reviews.title: I rarely need to set the volume above 10/100 to feel like my eardrums are experiencing everything possible from the audio ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying this, to use with my T5ps, has been an experience. I thought sound cards were a thing of the past, when motherboards didn't include a line-out natively. Moving up from the Realtek audio from my mobo to this has been life-changing. I rarely need to set the volume above 10/100 to feel like my eardrums are experiencing everything possible from the audio source. It's large, though! The product image might lead you to believe that's it a small device, but it's definitely noticeable on the desk. Check the dimensions to make sure it'll fit where you want.

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate Volume Control
customer_reviews.text: The Sound is amazing, I've been using sound blaster for many years and the quality of sound is always impressive. However, there is no way to control the volume besides windows volume control mixer (the big knob on the unit is tied to the windows volume). I am using 100W tower speakers and I have to set the volume on 2(out of 100). Small changes in the volume knob result in large change in sound loudness which makes this unit impractical to use with large tower speakers.

customer_reviews.text: PLEASE READ IMPORTANT for DOLBY: If you plan on gaming on your PS4 with Dolby go in to your PS4 sound settings and make sure the sound is Bit Stream Dolby Digital assuming you are using an optical cablr. Then go to your Creative x7 Sound blaster under cinematic make sure you set the Dynamic Range Control to Night Mode. This will help bring the cues closer and boost the mids!. Set it and leave it :)

product_meta.title: Sound Blaster X7 127dB 24bit/192kHz High-Res External USB DAC and Amplifier for PC and TV, with Burr-Brown DAC, Dolby Digital Decoder, SBX Pro Studio, Bluetooth and aptX Low-Latency, Optical and Mic
product_meta.description: Color:Black + 76W PowerThe Sound Blaster X7 is the ultimate upgrade for pro-gamers and audio enthusiasts. This feature-packed ultra High Resolution Audio (HRA) device acts as an external USB DAC and a powerful audio amplifier with low-latency Bluetooth connectivity and Dolby Digital decoder.
feature_bullets: 24-BIT 192KHZ HIGH-RES AUDIO FOR GREAT SOUND QUALITY – Hear more details and nuances of your audio playback, be it in games, movies, or music.
KICKASS 100W STEREO AMPLIFIER – Highly efficient amplifier lets you enjoy powerful audio with crystal-clear details when you pair with the E-MU XM7, a pair of passive bookshelf speakers.

KNOCK-OUT QUALITY DAC WITH DOLBY DIGITAL DECODING – The Burr-Brown PCM1794 127dB digital-to-analog converter (DAC), coupled with a built-in Dolby Digital decoder, lets you experience cinematic true-to-life 5.1 channel playback in high resolution.
CLASS-LEADING HEADPHONE AMPLIFIER – top-of-the-range TPA6120A2 headphone amplifier is capable of driving high-end 600Ω headphones, delivering powerful and pristine audio.
ADVANCED SOUND AND VOICE PROCESSING – SBX Pro Studio Technology adds a new level of immersion to your audio experience, while Crystal Voice Technology enhances audio pickup and focuses on your voice.
